main.name: Ofentse Gaosenkwe
main.description: I'm an IT final year student
main.bio: I’m a programming student who emjoys building web and mobile applications and I aspire to be building mobile apps professionally. I enjoy working with the full technology stack, from front to backend and everything inbetween. I enjoy seeing myself do magic with code and the reactions of the people I'm working with when they see my work. Most importantly, I love solving problems and I'm always eager to learn new languages/frameworks. Overall I’m passionate about technology and excited about the future.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: My first year was not that hard, I excelled in most of my modules but as the years progressed, it got harder. I added another year to my four year program. The workload became intense and by the fact that I had not done programming in high school, put on a lot of pressure on me. There was a time where I wanted to dropout because I had failed some of my 3rd year modules. However, despite the challenges, I told myself that no matter how long it takes me to obtain this degree, I will make sure to complete it.
